data.title: downtown cinema 8
data.text:
July 22 - 31 Schedule

EARLY BARGAIN MATINEES ARE RUNNING EVERY DAY !!!

Click on a MOVIE TITLEto take you to the movies homepage !!!

Click on Movie trailer to watch the preview !!!

DEADPOOL & WOLVERINE -

In 3-D + 2-D

17 and older, with ID -

Sci-Fi Action Comedy

Starts on Thursday, July 25

Movie trailer

PLOT: A listless Wade Wilson toils away in civilian life with his days as the morally flexible mercenary, Deadpool, behind him. But when his homeworld faces an existential threat, Wade must reluctantly suit-up again with an even more reluctant Wolverine.

CONTENT: Strong bloody violence and language throughout, gore and sexual references.

LENGTH, including previews: 2:20.

STARRING: Ryan Reynolds, Hugh Jackman, Emma Corrin, Morena Baccarin.

July 25 - 31 schedule

Early bargain matinees Friday - Wednesday !!!

3-D Thursday at 6:00,

3-D Friday - Wednesday at 2:30, 6:00,

Plus 3-D late shows Fri. and Sat. at 9:30,

2-D Thursday at 3:00, 4:00, 7:00,

2-D Friday - Wednesday at 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, 7:00,

Plus 2-D late shows Fri. and Sat. at 8:00, 9:00

LONGLEGS - 17 and older, with ID - Crime Horror Thriller -

Movie trailer

PLOT: FBI Agent Lee Harker (Monroe) is a gifted new recruit assigned to the unsolved case of an elusive serial killer (Cage). As the case takes complex turns, unearthing evidence of the occult, Harker discovers a personal connection to the merciless killer and must race against time to stop him before he claims the lives of another innocent family.

CONTENT: Bloody violence, disturbing images and some language.

LENGTH, including previews: 1:55.

STARRING: Nicolas Cage, Maika Monroe, Alicia Witt, Blair Underwood.

July 22 - 24 schedule

Early bargain matinees every day !!!

Every day at 1:40, 4:20, 7:10

July 25 - 31 schedule

Early bargain matinees every day !!!

Every day at 1:40, 4:30, 7:10,

Plus late shows Fri. and Sat. at 9:30

TWISTERS - PG-13 -

Action Adventure Thriller

Movie trailer

PLOT: As storm season intensifies, the paths of former storm chaser Kate Cooper, lured back to the open plains after a devastating encounter years prior, and reckless social-media superstar Tyler Owens collide when terrifying phenomena never seen before are unleashed. The pair and their competing teams find themselves squarely in the paths of multiple storm systems converging over central Oklahoma in the fight of their lives.

CONTENT: Rated PG-13 for intense action and peril, some language and injury images.

LENGTH, including previews: 2:15.

STARRING: Daisy Edgar-Jones, Glen Powell, Katy O'Brian, Maura Tierney.

July 22 - 24 schedule

Early bargain matinees every day !!!

Every day at 1:20,3:00, 4:10, 6:00, 7:00,

July 25 - 31 schedule

Early bargain matinees every day !!!

Every day at 1:20, 4:20, 6:10, 7:15,

Plus late shows Fri. and Sat. at 9:30

DESPICABLE ME 4 - PG -

Animated Comedy Adventure

Movie trailer

PLOT: Gru, Lucy, Margo, Edith, and Agnes welcome a new member to the family, Gru Jr., who is intent on tormenting his dad. Gru faces a new nemesis in Maxime Le Mal and his girlfriend Valentina, and the family is forced to go on the run.

CONTENT: Rated PG for action and rude humor.

LENGTH, including previews: 1:50.

STARRING: Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Joey King, Will Ferrell.

July 22 - 24 schedule

Early bargain matinees every day !!!

Every day at 1:50, 4:30, 7:10,

July 25 - 31 schedule

Early bargain matinees every day !!!

Every day at 1:50, 4:30, 7:10,

Plus late shows Fri. and Sat. at 9:30

INSIDE OUT 2 - PG -

Animated Comedy Adventure

Movie trailer

PLOT: Teenager Riley's mind headquarters is undergoing a sudden demolition to make room for something entirely unexpected: new Emotions! Joy, Sadness, Anger, Fear and Disgust, whove long been running a successful operation by all accounts, arent sure how to feel when Anxiety shows up. And it looks like shes not alone.

CONTENT: Rated PG for some thematic elements.

LENGTH, including previews: 1:50.

STARRING: Amy Poehler, Phyllis Smith, Lewis Black, Tony Hale.

July 22 - 24 schedule

Early bargain matinees every day !!!

Every day at 1:30, 4:20, 7:00,

July 25 - 31 schedule

Early bargain matinees every day !!!

Every day at 1:40, 4:30, 7:10

ADMISSION PRICES

Showtimes before 5 PM are matinee discount showtimes

All Seats ( 3 and older ) - $ 7.25, or $ 9.75 for 3-D movies!!!

Evening showtimes ( 5 PM and later )

Adult - $ 9.25 , or $11.75 for 3-D movies

Child ( 3 - 12 ) - $ 7.25 , or $ 9.75 for 3-D movies

Sr. Citizen ( 62 + over , or AARP ) - $ 7.25, or $ 9.75 for 3-D movies

College or Military with current college or military ID

Fri. - Sun. evenings - $ 8.25, or $ 10.75 for 3-D movies

College or Military with current college or military ID

Mon. - Thur. evenings - $ 7.25, or $ 9.75 for 3-D movies

Boxoffice opens about 20 minutes before the earliest showtime for that day !!!
